The Unseen Column

This technique, first described by Stuart Curry (@irishstu) involves simply hiding less important columns on smaller screen sizes. Using Bootstrap 4 Responsive utilities you can achieve that easily.More

No More Tables

This technique was developed by Chris Coyier and described in his post Responsive Data Tables at css-tricks.com.
Wrap a table with an element with class .no-more-tablesto activate this.
